sp_theme.css_variables:
<style>
        /* Modern ServiceNow Portal Theme */
        
        /* Global Reset and Base Styles */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        /* Root Variables for Easy Customization */
        :root {
            --primary-color: #0066cc;
            --primary-dark: #004d99;
            --secondary-color: #00a3e0;
            --accent-color: #ff6b35;
            --success-color: #28a745;
            --warning-color: #ffc107;
            --danger-color: #dc3545;
            --dark-color: #2c3e50;
            --light-color: #f8f9fa;
            --white: #ffffff;
            --text-dark: #2c3e50;
            --text-light: #6c757d;
            --border-color: #e9ecef;
            --shadow-light: 0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
            --shadow-medium: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
            --shadow-heavy: 0 8px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
            --border-radius: 12px;
            --border-radius-sm: 8px;
            --transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
        }
        
        /* Body and Layout */
        body {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--text-dark);
        }
        
        /* Header Styles */
        .navbar, .header {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            padding: 1rem 0;
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            z-index: 1000;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
        }
        
        .navbar-nav .nav-link {
            color: var(--text-dark) !important;
            font-weight: 500;
            transition: var(--transition);
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            margin: 0 0.25rem;
        }
        
        .navbar-nav .nav-link:hover {
            background: var(--primary-color);
            color: var(--white) !important;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        /* Search Bar Enhancement */
        .search-container, .homepage-search {
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 2rem auto;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .search-container input, .homepage-search input {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 1.5rem 1rem 3rem;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 50px;
            background: var(--white);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            transition: var(--transition);
            outline: none;
        }
        
        .search-container input:focus, .homepage-search input:focus {
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .search-container::before, .homepage-search::before {
            content: "üîç";
            position: absolute;
            left: 1rem;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        /* Main Content Container */
        .container, .main-content {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 2rem;
        }
        
        /* Service Cards Grid */
        .service-grid, .homepage-categories {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
            margin: 3rem 0;
        }
        
        /* Modern Service Cards */
        .service-card, .category-card, .panel, .widget {
            background: var(--white);
            border-radius: var(--border-radius);
            padding: 2rem;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: none;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .service-card:hover, .category-card:hover, .panel:hover, .widget:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
        }
        
        .service-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            height: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
        }
        
        /* Card Icons */
        .service-card .icon, .category-card .icon {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
            color: var(--white);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
        }
        
        /* Card Titles */
        .service-card h3, .category-card h3, .panel-title {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: var(--text-dark);
        }
        
        /* Card Descriptions */
        .service-card p, .category-card p {
            color: var(--text-light);
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        /* Modern Buttons */
        .btn, .service-card .btn, .category-card .btn, button {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--primary-dark));
            color: var(--white);
            border: none;
            padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            font-weight: 600;
            text-decoration: none;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            transition: var(--transition);
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }
        
        .btn:hover, .service-card .btn:hover, .category-card .btn:hover, button:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
            text-decoration: none;
            color: var(--white);
        }
        
        .btn-secondary {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-color), #e55a2b);
        }
        
        .btn-outline {
            background: transparent;
            border: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
            color: var(--primary-color);
        }
        
        .btn-outline:hover {
            background: var(--primary-color);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        
        /* Sidebar Widgets */
        .sidebar-widget, .requests-panel {
            background: var(--white);
            border-radius: var(--border-radius);
            padding: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--primary-color);
        }
        
        .sidebar-widget h4 {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: var(--text-dark);
        }
        
        /* List Items */
        .list-group-item, .request-item {
            border: none;
            padding: 1rem;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            background: transparent;
            transition: var(--transition);
        }
        
        .list-group-item:hover, .request-item:hover {
            background: var(--light-color);
            transform: translateX(5px);
        }
        
        .list-group-item:last-child, .request-item:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }
        
        /* Rating Stars */
        .rating {
            color: #ffd700;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin: 0.5rem 0;
        }
        
        /* Status Indicators */
        .status-indicator {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        }
        
        .status-pending {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.2);
            color: var(--warning-color);
        }
        
        .status-completed {
            background: rgba(40, 167, 69, 0.2);
            color: var(--success-color);
        }
        
        .status-urgent {
            background: rgba(220, 53, 69, 0.2);
            color: var(--danger-color);
        }
        
        /* Footer */
        .footer {
            background: var(--dark-color);
            color: var(--white);
            padding: 2rem 0;
            margin-top: 4rem;
        }
        
        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .service-grid, .homepage-categories {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 1rem;
            }
            
            .container, .main-content {
                padding: 1rem;
            }
            
            .service-card, .category-card {
                padding: 1.5rem;
            }
        }
        
        /* Animation Classes */
        .fade-in {
            animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out;
        }
        
        .slide-up {
            animation: slideUp 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; }
            to { opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        @keyframes slideUp {
            from { 
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(30px);
            }
            to { 
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        
        /* Custom Scrollbar */
        ::-webkit-scrollbar {
            width: 8px;
        }
        
        ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
            background: var(--light-color);
        }
        
        ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: var(--primary-color);
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        
        ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
            background: var(--primary-dark);
        }
        
        /* Glassmorphism Effects */
        .glass {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18);
        }
        
        /* Loading Animation */
        .loading {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border: 3px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 50%;
            border-top-color: var(--white);
            animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes spin {
            to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
    </style>
sp_theme.name: custom theme

sys_package.display_value: Resident service and visitor management system

sys_scope.display_value: Resident service and visitor management system
